attributes.title: This app is not worth it
attributes.review: This app glitches out my phone while I was trying to download it I was unable to finish the download and even use it. The fact that his own app doesn’t want people to see it should be taken as a sign that he is unfit to be president.

attributes.title: horrible!
attributes.review: this app is so disappointing! I downloaded the app but as soon as it was downloaded, a plane flew through my house killing my dog and crushing all my shrek movies. after that i was homeless for 2 weeks. then i got put in a mental asylums. i ate jello through my butthole everyday😔. never downloading again.

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: The app is terrible. It took forever to download and install. That’s unacceptable. It made my phone glitch and it wouldn’t stop. It was so annoying and it can’t be fixed. I had to end up purchasing a new phone. So disappointed

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: It stole all of my personal information, and it took me weeks to download the app. And it asked for my address and personal information for example when is my birthday and take a picture of your Social security number and my birth certificate.

attributes.title: This app is disgusting
attributes.review: The app took forever to download everything was loading slow inappropriate content and all around just horrible I recommend no one to download this not kid friendly at all imagine if my little siblings was to get a hold to this disgusting app 💅🏾🤦🏽‍♀️😌🧚🏽

attributes.title: Cheeto did my wrong
attributes.review: Wouldn’t recommend this app😔 it’s horrible 🍊orange aliens came out my phone😱 they ate my dogs🤬and then they took my house🥺and killed my mom😢 rip dad this app made look like lovely peaches🍑 the ugly aliens kept on making the Debby Ryan face at me😯 the yellow aliens killed me😵 so I’m dead I would not recommend this horrible app🙄
attributes.userName: the app was easy to use

attributes.title: BLM
attributes.review: I wish I could rate 0 stars😡 this app has completely bugged my phone, causing my phone to constantly request my location giving way to hackers and other malicious persons and software. This app needs to be taken down before more phones are infected!!!

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I’m sorry? But points to get a “better experience” awful. Dumb. Stupid. Idiotic. Also imagine voting for a sexist, homophobic, piece of garbage. First voting time sure, you were cheated. If you vote for him again you are literally stupid. Especially if you believe in the confederacy, a vote for Trump is a vote against your “southern heritage”. Good day.

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: I don’t like it. It took forever and I mean forever to download. When I opened it the content bored me and I had to leave a review. If you really want to make it interesting to look at try and put some rainbows and or unicorns on the screen. Otherwise I only have one word... no. Periodt
